main event: A registered nurse reported seeing a white light in the sky over Dumont, N.J. in March 1949.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a fast-moving plane but made no noise., The witness saw the object while waiting for a friend and described it as a white light the size of a small lime., The sighting lasted about five seconds before the object disappeared., The nurse attempted to report the sighting to local newspapers and the police, but received no support., The witness expressed skepticism about the sighting being a natural phenomenon, recalling experiences with shooting stars and northern lights.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
